snippet.title: The Quarter Game - Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
SIKE! I'm selling the game four quarters ($0.99) on Steam!
Release date is December 8, 2017: http://store.steampowered.com/app/703630/The_Quarter_Game/

Since the release date is the day before my birthday, I'll be a cool dude and give free Steam keys of my first Steam game to the first 100 people who fill out this form:
https://goo.gl/forms/xpEW2LAQD4fPCex92

But what even is this indie game about and why does it have so many waveshines and wavedashes from Super Smash Bros. Melee? Oh, you expected it! It's time for the regular "ChairGTables writes an entire essay on the description as a discrete way to get SEO keywords in". Yup! Here we go! But first of all, I want you to know that this was a 24 hour project I did with 8 other people for Extra Life 2017 so we can raise money and save children in hospitals! Shoutouts to my gamedev crew, Lame Dimension, and the other game development crew that helped us out, Flying Pudding Studios. I think this is a decent indie game with a bunch of original assets and a cool original soundtrack. If you were expecting an RPG Maker horror game, sorry but this isn't one! So basically, this game is where you play as an anime grill named Mashiro, or Mayu Shiro if you prefer the longer version. Whoops! Check that out! That's like 10 keywords already! Alright! So what happens here is that her CEO got kidnapped and it's up to her to save the CEO. Why? How should I know!? What? Because I'm the developer? Well, I gotta not spill the beans! Well, I guess I will be because of course I'm going to speedrun my own game as always. So, yeah! Beat up the bad guys and you become the new CEO! You'll learn so much about how low paying jobs can turn a handsome man into a black market lunatic and how milk can make your bones stronger! But does the main girl give me a boner? No. I actually don't like her lol. She's not fappable. I have a tier list of every original character I made based on who I'd nut to and she's probably on the D rank. Mashiro ain't my type, but you know, not everyone has the same taste so I gotta go beyond just my tastes so it can appeal to other people! Man! Only if Steam allowed me to sell this game for one quarter but friggin, they said the lowest I can sell it is a dollar. And I can't name it Four Quarters because a company already has that name and urghhghghgh legal issues lol. Okay! I hope I got enough keywords in! Let's hope that people will find my silly game in made in 24 hours.

If you're interested in checking out the other people involved in this game, here they are:
https://twitter.com/sylvysprit
https://twitter.com/Sonii_TV
https://soundcloud.com/david4jsus
https://twitter.com/FlyingPuddingSD
The rest don't have social media lol

Trailer made by Tuff Crowd: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCO72sMmxtAxyW8Toj-JbH_w

Also, the OST is already out. Just search it up and you're all good. But of course, what's a ChairGTables video without the Nutshack lyrics in the description? Never forget!

It’s the Nutshack! (Yee, yee)
It’s the Nutshack! (What'd he say?)
It’s the Nutshack! (Oh, yeah! Yeeeah!)
It’s the Nutshack! (Hey, I'm in that shit!)
It’s the Nutshack! (Don't forget ya boy Angel!)
It’s the Nutshack! (It’s the Nutshack!)
It’s the Nutshack! (It’s the Nutshack!)
It’s the Nutshack! (It’s the Nutshack…)
It’s the Nutshack! (Hey!)
It’s the Nutshack! (This beat's knockin'!)
It’s the Nutshack! (Wow!)
It’s the Nutshack!
Hoo-ugh!

Phil’s from the 'Sco, Jack’s from the P.I. (P.I!)
Horatio or Horat's so big-eyed! (Big-eyed!)
Tito Dick, “Dickman”, baby!
He raised Phil and loves the ladies.
Jack’s cool as lazy, he’s still learnin’.
Now, the one Cherry Pie, he's still a virgin. (Hoooo!)
Chita, meet the freak of the week-ah! (Week-ah!)
Phil’s homegirl, God, Jack wanna keep her.
But it’s not happenin’, neither! (No!)
Shakin’ like a seizure.
Hold up, let me spark this, take a breather.
Breathe the reefer in my lungs.
I got grapes, what you watchin’, son? (Son!)

It's the Nutshack!
It's the Nutshack!
It's the Nutshack!
It's the Nutshack!
It's the Nutshack!
It's the Nutshack!
It's the Nutshack! (Yo!)
It's the Nutshack! (Yo!)
Hoo-ugh!

Dwayne is a hater, later alligator. (Alligator!)
Phil is the leader of the masturbators. (Masturbators!)
Thanks to Sanjee, more porn than Ronnie. (Then Ronnie?)
Jeremy, see? (Oh!) Smelling like 'nani. (Ew!)
Oolie oolie ollie ollie, still be true-lie fo-sho-li. (Sho-li.)
Oolie oolie ollie ollie, do the foolie fo-sho-li. (Oh!)
Woah-wow, hyphy hypo. (Hypo!)
NUMP on the track, no, it's not a typo. (No, it's not a typo!)
30/30 Sick Wid It exquisite, explicit. (Explicit!)
Angel'll pimp your ride, without Xzibit. (Without Xzibit!)
Ed's got his back, (What?) he do what he can. (What he can!)
But whatever I do, I do it bigger than Manu! (Than my man!)

It's the Nutshack!
It's the Nutshack!
It's the Nutshack!
It's the Nutshack!
It's the Nutshack!
It's the Nutshack!
It's the Nutshack!
It's the Nutshack!
